name: Last (Metroid Games)
description:
♒ LAST ♒  Last as long as you can.  ► General instructions in game. (Mouse, any, space.)  ► Collect power-ups. Your score is added to your money, used to buy upgrades or power-ups. SCORING/HEALTH  ► +10 for monsters and score power-up, +20 for boss.  ► Your health is 100, monsters decrease it by 10, boss, by 20, boss's magic by 1.  NOTES AND CREDITS  ► All by me but the music is It Follows, composed by Disasterpiece. ►I tried pixel art without outlines ► For best large graphics zoom 200% small screen (lags)  ► Thanks to Neurocrist, my indie dev friend (doesn't have socials) for helping with bug fixes!  How has the limitation been followed?- By getting attacked and eventually getting killed by the monsters, you are presented with an intermission where you can buy upgrades to make yourself more powerful in the following rounds rather than playing continously without upgrades Made for Mini Jam 122-Intermission🎬🎞🎥📽

I have made it possible for Windows and Mac users to play the game. I haven't tested the Linux one yet. The game will soon be available on Amazon App Store
